extendedInfo.description: Upward Mobility's ACSM Certified Personal Trainer exam prep app for Android is our exclusive study aid designed for the American College of Sports Medicine Certified Personal Trainer certification, as well as the Certified Health Fitness Specialist and Exercise Specialist exams.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.FEATURES:*  486 simulated exam questions.*  Detailed explanations.*  Covers all core areas of the ACSM Exam Specifications, including: --  Exercise Prescription and Programming--  Exercise Physiology and Related Exercise Science--  Health Appraisal and Fitness Exercise Testing--  Clinical and Medical Considerations--  Nutrition and Weight Management--  Safety, Injury Prevention, and Emergency Procedures--  Human Behavior --  Program Administration, Quality Assurance, and Outcome Assessment*  Exclusive, intuitive interface.*  Study Mode -- Each question is paired with a clear and useful explanation. Study at your own pace!*  Test Mode -- Designed to simulate the exam experience. Set your own question and time constraints.*  Review your answers in both question-by-question and aggregate format. This app is not affiliated with the American College of Sports Medicine.ABOUT UPWARD MOBILITY:Upward Mobility is an independent test-preparation apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts and undergoes a thorough review process.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.

reviews.title: Great Tool
reviews.comment: Absolutely love the app, great help in my study prep. Wish it were a little easier to jump to questions, but it\'s definitely a great complimentary tool to my prep.
reviews.author: Viktoria Bozsoki

reviews.title: WTF!!?!?
reviews.comment: When I downloaded this app there 250 questions...now there are only 64... Funny I don\'t remember being refunded my money for the questions they took back that I payed for!  Don\'t waste your money!   Just stick to your books!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: A lot of questions in study mode and test mode, some are not ready covered in the books.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: It\'s a good overall study aid, but it doesn\'t differentiate between the levels of certification. Example, cPT doesn\'t need to know ekg info but there\'s still questions on content area. Bottom line: STUDY YOUR BOOKS! This won\'t help you pass because questions are completely different.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too easy
reviews.comment: These questions are insanely easy. I can go 100 questions without missing 1 but on the real ACSM exam I got 70%
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Really got me going takin my test before end of the month
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I went to the 3 day workshop and used this app to study and perpare for the cPT exam. I DIDNT read the recommended textbooks and I passed my 1st try!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Amazing tool to have for study.thank you
reviews.author: Gail Scharnhorst
